resources.string: No notes yet,\nPress Menu to add new note.

"Speak2Send v1.4 is a simple notepad application with speech input, you can send the record to other applications in your phone, such as SMS, Email, Twitter, FaceBook, etc. 
I will add more functions later. 
Long press on Note to DELETE it.
This program requires the support of Google voice search APP, if there is a lack of voice recognition, the button appears 'Recognizer not present'. Please install Google Voice Search first, you can download it from 
http://tetrisdroid.googlecode.com/files/voicesearch.zip 
Google's speech recognition servers currently support English, Mandarin Chinese, and Japanese. Voice input is available in these three languages only.
If you have any suggestions or comments, please send mail to tossking@gmail.com.
Program icon was designed by Lin Fan , thanks for her lovely little rabbit :>.
Thank you for using my little program :)."
Attachment is my notes exported from my Android phone.
